document_data.name: Shattershield
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shattershield''' family of [[dwarves]] was the only non-[[human]] [[patriar]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]]. They were an institution in the city, so much so that they had earned the same level of elitism and snobbishness as the Gate's human families.
document_data.Relationships: The Baldurian Shattershields were distantly related to [[Clan Shattershield]], the dwarves that built the old realm of [[Sarbreen]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.History: The Shattershields were heavily involved in the construction of the Gate's old walls, during the city's formative years.
document_data.Notable Members:
* [[Bronzwin Shattershield]], an adventuring warrior in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
* [[Rugger Shattershield]], a member of the [[Parliament of Peers]] of Baldur's Gate in the 15{{th}} century DR.
